thread.title: Comment on WENYEN GABRIEL COMMITS TO KENTUCKY by Donald Hurt
thread.title_full: Comment on WENYEN GABRIEL COMMITS TO KENTUCKY by Donald Hurt

author: Donald Hurt
title: Comment on WENYEN GABRIEL COMMITS TO KENTUCKY by Donald Hurt
text:
Posted in BB Recruiting , Main | 20 Responses 
Kentucky basketball picked up a surprise commitment today when Wenyen Gabriel announced he will play for UK , choosing the Cats over the Duke Blue Devils. 
Gabriel is the fourth-ranked power forward in the 2016 class, according to the 247 Composite Rankings. He took his official visit to Lexington last weekend. 
Mike Kryszuskeuswki and members of the Duke staff visited him at his high school in Massachusetts on Tuesday, hoping to steal some of the momentum from Gabriel’s trip to UK. He was scheduled to take his official visit to Duke in two weeks, but that trip will likely be canceled now that he is a member of Calipari’s recruiting class at Kentucky. 
Gabriel was also considering Maryland, UConn and Providence. 
More on this to come… Article written by Drew Franklin I can recite every line from Forrest Gump, blindfolded. Follow me on Twitter: @DrewFranklinKSR 20 responses to “WENYEN GABRIEL COMMITS TO KENTUCKY” BlueRedneck October 1, 2015 at 11:49 am | Permalink | Reply 
YES!! Feels good to steal a recruit from Coach Buy-A-Vowell. lilWildcat22 October 1, 2015 at 11:49 am | Permalink | Reply 
In Cal we trust! GO BIG BLUE! J-Dub421 October 1, 2015 at 11:50 am | Permalink | Reply 
Welcome to the BBN Wenyen! Michael October 1, 2015 at 11:58 am | Permalink | Reply
